message.content: {"given_definition_quality":80,"better_definition":"child; little boy or girl","sentence":"小朋友在笑。","image_prompt":"A group of happy, young children (little boys and girls) are smiling together in a park. The scene is bright but slightly faded, with gentle apocalyptic overtones in the sky—muted pastel clouds and indistinct, crumbling city structures in the distant background. The children are front and center, carefree and joyful, on soft, grassy ground, animated in a soft apocalypse style with warm, gentle light and a sense of innocence and hope.","sentence_translation":"The child is smiling."}
